CustomField.description: The Target Value that gets populated within the Target Field upon matching
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Target Value that gets populated within the Target Field upon matching. Provide a hard-coded value or use merge values like "{TODAY}", "{NOW}", "{TRUE}", "{FALSE}", "{NULL}", or merge names for fields: "{Opportunity.AccountId} - {Opportunity.StageName}". Provided without quotes
CustomField.label: Target Value
